definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Maoist chief Prachanda was elected by a majority of the governing assembly over his only rival from the Nepali Congress Party.
sentences.chinese: 毛派主席普拉昌達以巨大優勢戰勝尼泊爾國會黨對手。

sentences.english: The heart of the process is the writing of a new constitution, a long-standing Maoist demand.
sentences.chinese: 整個問題的核心是毛派一直要求制的定一部新憲法。

sentences.english: A female Maoist soldier sits in one of the group's camps.
sentences.chinese: 一位毛派女兵在營帳中。

sentences.english: So which mechanism can be formed to include the Maoists?
sentences.chinese: 那麼應建立一個什麼樣的包括毛派的機構呢？

sentences.english: In last year’s election the Maoists won 38% of the seats in a Constituent Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 在去年的選舉裏毛派贏得38%制憲代表的席次。

sentences.english: A cornerstone of the Maoists' armed struggle was abolition of the monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 毛派武裝鬥爭的基本目標就是剷除君主制。
